text: A Chord Too Far is a box set from the English keyboardist Tony Banks, released on 31 July 2015 on Cherry Red Records. The set includes tracks from each album from his solo career, spanning from 1979 to 2012. ==Track listing== All songs performed by Tony Banks, except where noted. *Remixed by Nick Davis & Tony Banks ===CD 1=== # "Rebirth*" (from Soundtracks, 1986) – 1:23 # "At the Edge of Night*" (from The Fugitive, 1983) – 6:01 # "Walls of Sound" (Performed by Strictly Inc;
